trans-unit.source: Adds a list of the best customers to the Stats dashboard.
trans-unit.target: Adauga o lista cu cei mai buni clienti la tabloul de bord Statistici.

trans-unit.source: Keeping a client can be more profitable than gaining a new one. That is one of the many reasons it is necessary to cultivate customer loyalty.
trans-unit.target: Pastrarea unui client poate fi mai profitabila decat castigarea altuia nou. Acesta este unul din multele motive pentru care este necesara cultivarea loialitatii clientilor.

trans-unit.source: Word of mouth is also a means for getting new, satisfied clients. A dissatisfied customer can hurt your e-reputation and obstruct future sales goals.
trans-unit.target: Zvonul este un alt mod de a obtine clienti noi, multumiti. Un client nemultumit poate dauna e-reputatiei tale si sa dauneze viitoarelor tinte de vanzari.

trans-unit.source: In order to achieve this goal, you can organize:
trans-unit.target: Pentru a atinge acest tel poti organiza:

trans-unit.source: Punctual operations: commercial rewards (personalized special offers, product or service offered), non commercial rewards (priority handling of an order or a product), pecuniary rewards (bonds, discount coupons, payback).
trans-unit.target: Operatiuni punctuale: recompense comerciale (oferte speciale personalizate, produse sau servicii oferite), recompense necomerciale (prelucrare comenzi cu prioritate), recompense pecuniare (obligatiuni, cupoane de reducere, restituiri de bani).

trans-unit.source: Sustainable operations: loyalty points or cards, which not only justify communication between merchant and client, but also offer advantages to clients (private offers, discounts).
trans-unit.target: Operatiuni sustenabile, puncte de loialitate sau carduri, care nu numai ca justifica comunicarea dintre comerciant si client, dar ofera si avantaje clientilor (oferte private, reduceri).

trans-unit.source: These operations encourage clients to buy products and visit your online store more regularly.
trans-unit.target: Aceste actiuni incurajeaza clientii sa cumpere produse si sa viziteze mai des magazinul tau.

trans-unit.source: Enrich your stats, add a list of the best customers to the dashboard.
trans-unit.target: Imbogateste statisticile adaugand o lista cu cei mai buni clienti la tabloul de bord.
